ygData.subject: Re: Playing on Test server
ygData.msgSnippet: Bree, I would LOVE to join you guys on test.  What are your names? I need to decide what kind of character to make.  That is a good combo, BTW...a bard, cleric
ygData.messageBody:
Bree, I would LOVE to join you guys on test. What are your names? I need to
decide what kind of character to make. That is a good combo, BTW...a bard,
cleric and monk. Gotta figure out what class/race combo that is good can
start in Freeport, since I know I'd never get a teleport or bind if I was
born in like Erudin or Kelethin.

Mik
----- Original Message -----
From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 8:07 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Playing on Test server


> From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>
> Ya know we said the same thing....If we could move our entire guild over
to
> test we would, but that is just impossible.....there are only 3 of us on
> test at this time. we have me the cleric, our paladin is a monk and our
> ranger is a bard. If ya feel like making a character there you are
welcome
> to hunt along with us, we all started out in freeport. they are lvl 5 and
> i'm lvl 4, we are hunting right near the zone point in befallen and we
were
> the only people there last night, the XP was great )
>
> I was so happy I made patchwork pants for myself )))
> Funny the things you get enjoyment out of again
>
> Bree/Laurelei
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Mikaela Valorblade <mikaela@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 8:07 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Playing on Test server
>
>
> > From: "Mikaela Valorblade" <mikaela@...>
> >
> > Bree, I think that is wonderful. I tried creating new characters on
other
> > servers but what I found was that while I didn't miss the "twinking" I
did
> > with my other babies on The Rathe, what I DID miss were my friends and
my
> > guild and all the things we did together. (Can't live without green
> spam!!)
> > So for me, going to another server isn't really an option right now.
It's
> > really the people that keep me coming back to EQ, not just the game. If
I
> > could bundle them all up and take them to Test, I would, but
> unfortunately,
> > it isn't gonna happen.
> >
> > Mik
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
> > To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Monday, December 06, 1999 7:45 AM
> > Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Playing on Test server
> >
> >
> > > From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
> > >
> > > My Friends and I are burned out quite a bit on Fennin Ro, way too
> crowded,
> > > and the Planes are near to impossible half the time. Well, we decided
> to
> > > take a break and I am having a blast.
> > >
> > > We created characters on the test server. No Spam, No crowding, and no
> > > problems so far about finding stuff to hunt. We are still very young
yet
> > > though and it is fun having to work for all our stuff again. On
Fennin
> We
> > > could create newbie and give them things, but on test we can't "twink"
> so
> > it
> > > feels just like it did when I started out on March 18th.
> > > I made a cleric again, while my friends made classes that are
different
> > form
> > > what their high levels on Fennin are. My thought are I have always
> liked
> > > playign the cleric and well if we are gonna go anywhere on Test, you
> have
> > to
> > > have a cleric so I am happy to repeat.
> > >
> > > Just thought I would share that with everyone, I am having a blast
once
> > > again =)
> > >
> > > Bree, 50th cleric of Fennin Ro
> > > Laurelei, 4th cleric of Test
> > >
> > >
> >
> > >
>
>
